metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 24 (2003) - CO2 in the North Pacific Ocean : PICES Working Group 13 Final Report / edited by Richard A. Feely
metadata.description:
Reports on (1) synthesis of the WOCE/JGOFS global CO2 survey data in the North Pacific, (2) air-sea CO2 fluxes, (3) DIC, Talk and antrhopogenic CO2 distributions in the North Pacific, and (4) Biogeochemical and global implications.

   [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.24.  ISBN 0973149248 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report results from the PICES Working Group 13.

Status: Complete
